about_the_game:
MicroFactory is a factory tycoon game where you can create your company, setup assembly lines and start manufacturing your electronics products,
Your adventure starts on a unique island. Feel free to explore it and reach other islands!

Start building your base! Collect resources, craft machines and decorations to keep improving your factory!

Lore

You play as a genius engineer that was sailing to another continent in search of recognition for your newest project. The trip didn't go well, and you happened to be stranded in an uncharted island.

Nothing is able to stop you. You decided to put yourself to work and recreate everything from the ground up.

Starting from nothing, gather resources, create a solid base to start working on your dream projects. After you create communication devices, you decide to not leave the island, and show to the world your accomplishments.

Each world is different

The world is yours. You decide what you want to make.
Everything is connected and your progress influences the future of your world too.

You need a computer to start ordering products online. You can create your own, or buy components from other companies. The performance of your computer will influence the speed and consumption.

If you discover a new technology, you can patent it so other companies also use it, thus increase the scale of your business.

Market

There are a tons of products that you can make. But keep in mind that you have competition.

You should always take a look at what people are looking for. As the times goes on, you build reputation and people will not expect bad quality products.

Management and Logistics

It's time to automate tasks!

Create new machines that can do things for you. Plan your assembly lines and build an electricity network to power all your machines.



Stay tuned by joining our server.
